name: Extreme Ball Trip 2: Christmas Adventures HD Free
name_original: Extreme Ball Trip 2: Christmas Adventures HD Free
description:
★★★★ Extreme Ball Trip ★★★★

Play Extreme Ball Trip : Christmas Adventures HD Free with simple control machine.
Use tilt controls to roll and tilt your ball.
If you need to slow down quickly, press right down buttom "BREAK" or button "JUMP" to jump.

What is your mission?
Pick up all the shiny things on a each track to move to the next level.
Stay out of mines, electricity and don't fall of a track.

GOOD LUCK!
